@graph.name: Spicy Maple Mustard Tofu Bowl with Sweet Potatoes - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Spicy Maple Mustard Tofu Bowl with crunchy tofu and roasted sweet potatoes is the perfect meal prep lunch or weeknight dinner

itemListElement.name: Spicy Maple Mustard Tofu Bowl with Sweet Potatoes

@graph.name: Spicy Maple Mustard Tofu Bowl with Sweet Potatoes
@graph.description: Healthy, flavorful, and satisfying, this easy Spicy Maple Mustard Tofu Bowl with crunchy baked marinated tofu and roasted sweet potatoes is the perfect meal prep lunch bowl or weeknight dinner and so versatile.  A vegan version of honey mustard chicken and sooo good you will want to have it every day! Add any nut or fruit you like to make this yours!
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon flour or use corn starch to make it gluten-free
14 ounces of extra firm tofu (pressed for 15 minutes and cubed)
oil as needed  for sweet potatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Make the marinade by mixing all the ingredients in a bowl and set aside. Press and cube the tofu if you haven’t already
recipeInstructions.name: Make the marinade by mixing all the ingredients in a bowl and set aside. Press and cube the tofu if you haven’t already

recipeInstructions.text: Add your pressed and cubed tofu to the marinade and toss well. Let it sit for 5 minutes. Mix the crispy coating ingredients in a shallow bowl
recipeInstructions.name: Add your pressed and cubed tofu to the marinade and toss well. Let it sit for 5 minutes. Mix the crispy coating ingredients in a shallow bowl

recipeInstructions.text: Then carefully transfer the marinated tofu to the shallow bowl leaving the excess marinade in the original bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Then carefully transfer the marinated tofu to the shallow bowl leaving the excess marinade in the original bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the tofu in the coating to coat all of the tofu. Then transfer to a parchment-lined baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss the tofu in the coating to coat all of the tofu. Then transfer to a parchment-lined baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, add the sweet potatoes, 1/4 tsp salt, black pepper to taste, thyme, and 1 teaspoon oil and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, add the sweet potatoes, 1/4 tsp salt, black pepper to taste, thyme, and 1 teaspoon oil and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Toss well to coat and spread the sweet potato cubes on the same baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss well to coat and spread the sweet potato cubes on the same baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 400 degrees F (200 c )  for 25-30 minutes or until the tofu is crisp and the sweet potato is cooked to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 400 degrees F (200 c )  for 25-30 minutes or until the tofu is crisp and the sweet potato is cooked to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing by combining all the ingredients in a small bowl. I also like to add a couple of blueberries to this dressing and smash them just for color and a different flavor
recipeInstructions.name: Make the dressing by combining all the ingredients in a small bowl. I also like to add a couple of blueberries to this dressing and smash them just for color and a different flavor

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble your bowl by adding spinach or other greens of choice. Some blueberries, apples, a good helping of the tofu and the sweet potato. Drizzle with the dressing and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Assemble your bowl by adding spinach or other greens of choice. Some blueberries, apples, a good helping of the tofu and the sweet potato. Drizzle with the dressing and serve.

@graph.keywords: tofu bowl recipe, vegan bowl with tofu
